 9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_FIR_BACKEND_HPP
10#define VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_FIR_BACKEND_HPP
11
12#include <vsip/support.hpp>
13#include <vsip/core/signal/types.hpp>
14#include <vsip/vector.hpp>
15#include <vsip/domain.hpp>
16#include <vsip/core/refcount.hpp>
17#include <vsip/core/dispatch_tags.hpp>
18
19namespace vsip
20{
21namespace impl
22{
23
24// base class to be used by all Fir_impl<> specializations.
25template <typename T, symmetry_type S, obj_state C> 
26class Fir_backend : public Ref_count<Fir_backend<T, S, C> >
27{
28public:
29  static length_type order(length_type k)
30  { return k * (1 + (S != nonsym)) - (S == sym_even_len_odd);}
31
32  Fir_backend(length_type i, length_type k, length_type d)
33    : input_size_(i), order_(order(k) - 1), decimation_(d)
34  {
35    assert(input_size_ > 0);
36    assert(decimation_ > 0);
37    assert(order_ + 1 > decimation_); // M >= decimation
38    assert(input_size_ >= order_);    // input_size >= M 
39    // must be after asserts because of division
40    output_size_ = (input_size_ + decimation_ - 1) / decimation_;
41  }
42  Fir_backend(Fir_backend const &fir)
43    :  Ref_count<Fir_backend>(),  // copy is unique, count starts at 1.
44       input_size_(fir.input_size_),
45       output_size_(fir.output_size_),
46       order_(fir.order_),
47       decimation_(fir.decimation_)
48  {}
49
50  virtual ~Fir_backend() {}
51  virtual Fir_backend *clone() = 0;
52
53  length_type kernel_size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return order_ + 1;}
54  length_type filter_order() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return order_ + 1;}
55  length_type input_size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return input_size_;}
56  length_type output_size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return output_size_;}
57  vsip::length_type decimation() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return decimation_;}
58
59  virtual length_type apply(T *in, stride_type in_stride, length_type in_length,
60                            T *out, stride_type out_stride, length_type out_length) = 0;
61  virtual void reset() VSIP_NOTHROW = 0;
62  virtual char const* name() { return "fir-backend-base"; }
63
64protected:
65  length_type input_size_;
66  length_type output_size_; 
67  length_type order_;         // M in the spec
68  length_type decimation_;  
69};
70
71} // namespace vsip::impl
72} // namespace vsip
73
74
75#endif
